name: "Court of Justice's Respect"
description: A metal and glass building that looks like a fortress. It has the same design as the "Cabinet D'avocats." Compared to other buildings in the Court of Fontaine, this one has thicker walls and a tighter layout that gives visitors a distinct sense of "solemnity." When most city residents pass by, they will speak a little softer, and indeed, will avoid making any noise at all â€” an expression of respect for the traditions of trials, and also for the Champion Duelists.
